: : Darkangel : :

Darkangel was still sitting around the Tripredacus base doing nothing. It had been boring since Dreadplague had left.

The computer picked up a pod coming down. Soon after it read an explosion in the same area. A small radar blip traveled away from it, and then came to a stop near a volcano.

Darkangel: Hmm, a new bot on the planet. They could be an ally or an enemy. I better investigate. Beast mode!

He transformes to bot mode, and flies off towards DeathSteel.



---------------------------------
